text: Enrico De Nicola, (; 9 November 1877 â€“ 1 October 1959) was an Italian jurist, journalist, politician. He was the head of state of republican Italy from 1946 to 1948. He became the first president of Italy on 1 January 1948. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1877 births Category:1959 deaths Category:Presidents of Italy Category:Presidents of the Italian Senate Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Italy) Category:Politicians from Naples
